briefdescription.para: return the number of interactions of the selected type stored in this data structure

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : nb_inter = inter_handler_2D_tgetNb(inter_id)
inter_id
(integer) : type of interaction (lmgc90 parameter)
nb_inter (integer) : number of interaction found of selected type

briefdescription.para: return the contact law number of an interaction stored this data structure

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : tact_law = inter_handler_2D_tgetTactLawNb(inter_id, icdan)
inter_id
(integer) : type of interaction (lmgc90 parameter)
icdan
(integer) : index of the interaction of selected type
tact_law (integer) : contact law number

briefdescription.para: return the serial numbers of contacting objects for an interaction stored in this data structure

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : idBodies = inter_handler_2D_tgetIdBodies(inter_id, icdan)
inter_id
(integer) : type of interaction (lmgc90 parameter)
icdan
(integer) : index of the interaction of selected type
idBodies (integer) : array with cd and an bodies serial number

briefdescription.para: Get the integer data of an interaction stored in this data structure.

detaileddescription.para: idata vector holds cd body type, an body type, cd body id, an body id, cd contactor type, an contactory type, cd contactor id, an contactor id, cd subcontactor id, an subcontactor id, tact law id, status, number of internals
usage : idata = inter_handler_2D_tgetIData(inter_id, icdan)

parameterdescription.para: (integer) : index of the interaction of selected type

briefdescription.para: return the real data associated with an interactions

detaileddescription.para: Get an output array with, in this order, : coor, tuc, nuc, vlt, vln, rlt, rln, gapTT

python usage : rdata = inter_handler_2D_tgetRData(inter_id, icdan)
inter_id
(integer) : type of interaction (lmgc90 parameter)
icdan
(integer) : index of the interaction of selected type
rdata (double array) : array with real data of the interaction

memberdef.argsstring: (int inter_id, int icdan, double *rvector_in=NULL, int rlength_in=0, int index=0, double value=0.)
memberdef.name: inter_handler_2D_tsetInternal

briefdescription.para: Set the internal of an interaction (either the array or a single value) stored in this data structure.

detaileddescription.para: Uses copy. If internal array is provided, the whole array is set. Otherwise index and value must be provided and a single value is set.
usage : inter_handler_2D_tsetInternal(inter_id, icdan, internal) or inter_handler_2D_tsetInternal(inter_id, icdan, index, value)

parameterdescription.para: (integer) : index of the interaction of selected type
(integer) : the index where to set single value
(double ) : the new value to put at index

briefdescription.para: Get the internal of an interaction stored in this data structure.

detaileddescription.para: usage : internal = inter_handler_2D_tgetInternal(inter_id, icdan)

parameterdescription.para: (integer) : index of the interaction of selected type

briefdescription.para: return the number of recuped interactions of the selected type

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : nb_recup = inter_handler_2D_getNbRecup(inter_id)
inter_id
(integer) : type of interaction (lmgc90 parameter)
nb_inter (integer) : number of interaction recuped of selected type

briefdescription.para: return the number of interactions of the selected type stored in verlet data structure

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : nb_inter = inter_handler_2D_getNb(inter_id)
inter_id
(integer) : type of interaction (lmgc90 parameter)
nb_inter (integer) : number of interaction found of selected type

briefdescription.para: return the tact law number of all interactions stored in verlet data structure

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : vector = inter_handler_2D_getAllTactLawNb(inter_id)
inter_id
(integer) : type of interaction (lmgc90 parameter)
vector (int 1D-array) : mechanical data

briefdescription.para: return coorx,coory,tx,ty,nx,ny,rlt,rln,vlt,vln,gaptt for all interactions stored in verlet data structure

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : array = inter_handler_2D_getAll(inter_id)
inter_id
(integer) : type of interaction (lmgc90 parameter)
array (double 2D-array) : mechanical data

briefdescription.para: return internal variables for all interactions stored in verlet data structure

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : array = inter_handler_2D_getAllInternal(inter_id)
inter_id
(integer) : type of interaction (lmgc90 parameter)
array (double 2D-array) : mechanical data

briefdescription.para: return all integer data of all 'verlet' interaction

detaileddescription.para: Which are in order cd body type, an body type, cd body id, an body id, cd contactor type, an contactory type, cd contactor id, an contactor id, cd subcontactor id, an subcontactor id, tact law id, status, number of internals

python usage : array = inter_handler_2D_getAllIdata(inter_id)
inter_id
(integer) : type of interaction (lmgc90 parameter)
array (int 2D-array) : identification data

briefdescription.para: return integer number of verlet interaction of a candidate

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : iantac = inter_handler_2D_getVerletAdjsz(inter_id, icdtac)
inter_id
(integer) : type of interaction (lmgc90 parameter)
icdtac
(integer) : candidate contactor id
iantac (integer) : number of verlet interactions on candidate

briefdescription.para: return integer antagonist contact of a verlet interaction

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : iantac = inter_handler_2D_getVerletIantac(inter_id, icdtac, iadj)
inter_id
(integer) : type of interaction (lmgc90 parameter)
icdtac
(integer) : candidate contactor id
iadj
(integer) : id of adjacent of candidate
iantac (integer) : id of antagonist contactor corresponding to verlet interaction

briefdescription.para: Put back the reac value of bodies from (this) interactions.

detaileddescription.para:
python usage : inter_handler_2D_stockRloc(inter_id)
inter_id
(integer) : type of interaction (lmgc90 parameter)

python usage : inter_handler_2D_recupRloc(inter_id)
inter_id
(integer) : type of interaction (lmgc90 parameter)

briefdescription.para: recup from verlet to this using position as criteria

detaileddescription.para: Only available for CLALp and PLPLx inter_id

python usage : inter_handler_2D_recupRloc(inter_id, rtol)
inter_id
(integer) : type of interaction (lmgc90 parameter)
rtol
(real) : tolerance to decide if contact is recup
